channel.title: Project Dungeonfest. Npc Kill = Pc Point
channel.description:
Hello, I am helping my friend with his source Project dungeon fest. Now when I say "his" I just mean the one he is using so don't flame. He wants me to try and add it to where if you kill a certain npc you get a pest control point. I don't know if this is possible at all but if it is please help. If you need any contact details reply with the ones you need. ex: Skype, Msn, email etc
Thanks for anyone who helps or tries to help

item.title: Project Dungeonfest. Npc Kill = Pc Point
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

Lil wayne fan:

Hey, uhm i was using the same sorce but when i tried to change it, and update my server it kicked me out and i can never log in again it just freezes on me if you can please try and give a suggestion or some sort of answer/help.

When you run the server does it have any errors?

Read full topic
item.source: Project Dungeonfest. Npc Kill = Pc Point
